1143231.content:
(For now we shall tell the story from the point of view of Aang)

We had been captured the day just before. Turns out spending too much time in a fire nation school was not such a good idea. Words had come out, and somehow, it seems Azula heard about it. Long story short, she came we fought, we fled, we got stopped and taken out... and in also. So there I stood, in a cell, wrists tightly locked. I slowly rose to consciousness and inspected the cell where I was. I'd gladly tell you more about it but... well that was just a boring cell. There must have been someone watching on me from behind the door, for just a few minutes guards came to my cell, and took me with them, very careful that I was not able to do anything against them, move an inch or so. They brought me to a larger room, with pillar displaced like for some sort of ritual. A familiar face came to greet me.
"Ah, Avatar Aang. Capturing you is always the best part of my day", Azula laughed. "It is also usually soon followed by the frustration of seeing you escape. And as much as I would like to kill you, we wouldn't want you reincarnating would we ? So I searched of a way I could render you incapable of anything without killing you."

"Must I conclude that you have finally found one ?" I fearfully asked.

"As a matter of fact I have. The first one was to kill you during your avatar state, but you seem to be incapable of entering that state (some avatar you are really), so I have found another way. I will simply turn you into something inanimate, something I can always keep on me."

"Th... That's impossible !"

"Difficult in fact, but far from impossible. With the help of both a great earthbender and a great waterbender I can remodel you body to my wishing. With the help of both a great airbender and a firebender I can take out the sparkle of life that animates your body. And then you can be made into anything, provided that the ritual is followed closely, which is why we are here."

"I wonder where you would find the great benders that you need for your ritual who will be willing to listen."

"It is true that this is the most difficult part of the thing. But if you remember correctly I have now working for me some people well versed in the usage of hypnosis."

Suddenly two girls appeared. Katara and Toph.

"Now, those two girls are a little too strong to be turned into good puppets forever, but I only need them for a few minutes at most. As for the airbender, you will fill the part. I can guess that you won't be willing, but I really only need your presence, not that you do anything, well not anything that Katara can't make you do with her blood bending. Now let's get started shall we ?"

I was tracked to the middle of the room. Azula, Toph and Katara began dancing. Suddenly I began too. Soon a strange sensation came over me.

"You're looking a little pale avatar." Azula shouted. "I guess this is working"

The dance continued for a while. What I had first took for one of Azula's taunt turned out to be the truth. A quick glance at my hands made me realize that they were white. I began feeling weak. Soon my body stopped moving and just stood there unable to do anything.

"Your part is done Avatar. Just relax and enjoy what's coming next !" she laughed.

I wasn't sure of what was happening to me, but it felt like I was... flattening. And shrinking to. Or at least the room was getting bigger.

A few minutes later, the ritual ended.

"Okay, that's the end everyone, take the girls back to their cells and lock them tight so that they don't break out. We will take care of them tomorrow."

The guards and Toph and Katara left. Azula walked up to me.

"I guess that worked Avatar."

Whatever form I had taken, she picked me up and took me with her, to what I assumed was her room.

"We are going to have so much fun together !" she said as she took of her pants. I wondered why till she walked up to the mirror and put me in front of it. Suddenly I realized two things : Azula had a some weird kink, but I could deal with that, but more importantly she had turned me into a DIAPER !! And since her vagina was in plain sight, I guessed she was going to put me on.
And soon two other things became evident : my guess was true, and my vision was placed on the inside of my "body" which mean that the only thing I could now see was her vagina.

"Unfortunately it seems that inanimate transformation does not let one retain his or her senses of smell and taste. But I think we can still have fun. In case you were wondering, you are not washable, but I made sure during the ritual that I would be able to have fun with you forever."

I wondered was she had in mind next, and also if I would ever be able to escape my predicament.

1541121.content:
Azula ran frantically into the thick forest after saying "Same as always, Zulu. Even when you're strong... you're weak." As she ran, she kept her eyes to the ground, trying to hide her sliver of tears. Zuko was wrong. They all were wrong, wrong to trust that she-demon.

So wild were her feelings and thoughts, that she wasn't paying attention to anything else. As a result, she eventually tripped on a tree root in the Forgotten Forest.
As she fell, she tried to firebend her way up. Sadly, she was still lost in thought and couldn't give a powerful firebolt. She fell face flat on a now charred ground.

Normally, she would stand up and help her determined image. However, that didn't happen tonight; she felt defeated. She only laid there, thinking to herself "you've gotten what you want. you broke me, now end me." Time went by, about ten minutes, and Azula just closed her eyes and thought. "I see, I don't deserve a fast death."

The air was warm like blankets and against Azula's will, she was quickly asleep. Her movements completely changed while alseep. Instead of being stiff and motionless, she turned on her back and ever so often moved her legs and arms. Her dreams were pulling up memories upon memories. Some memories showed how nice her mother was, others showed how mean she was. It was as if Azula's dream conscious was at war with itself.

After a couple hours went by, wolf spirit of the Mother of Faces appeared. The wolf spirit looked at Azula with curosity. So, the spirit gently levitated Azula on its back and transported it and her to the spirit world. The spirit brought her to its master.

The Mother of Faces looked down at the sleeping Azula and asked "Is this the human who was disrupting my waters? The same human who was daughter to the other human?

The wolf spirit nodded a 'yes.'

His master responded with intrigue. "This season I have done much. I gave intel, and returned the faces of two humans. Though, you brought her to me for a reason I suppose. There is nothing I will do. What needs to be done is my daughters responsibility. Fetch my daughter."

The wolf spirit nodded and within a half hour returned with another spirit. This spirit looked like an enormous flower, a red rose to be exact.

The Mother of Faces spoke "Thank you for coming daughter. My wolf spirit sent this human to me." she pointed to Azula. "Sadly, I don't think there is anything I can do. Can you?"

The Rose spirit spoke "Ah, perhaps her current identity needs some reworking. Well, I, Spirit of Youth, can do something." The spirit then gently touched Azula's forehead. "This soul seems very damaged, her current dreams are a mix of good and bad energy. It also seems to center around her mother. There is one thing I can do to ensure good energy comes about. Return her to the age of one."

The Face spirit asked "Will I need to change her mind?"

"No, there is no need. Her mind will soon follow her body." There was no response and the Youth spirit said "Very well then."

The spirit then formed a plant where Azula was sleeping. The plant soon sprout a stalk and then engulfed Azula in a flower bud. A bright silouhette of Azula soon formed, and then it shrunk. Within in minute, the bud opened showing a regressed Azula. Azula's hair remained similar, however everything else changed. Now she wore only a tiny red shirt and fluffy white diaper. Azula yawned in a high pitched voice and started sucking her thumb.

The youth spirit gleefully smiled "Awwww, isn't youth gorgorgous. This old trick worked, she's only thinking of good memories now."

Kiyi was ecstatic "There's a baby outside!"

Ursa remarked "a baby?"

She opened the door and soon saw the basket. She knelt down and smiled "Well, aren't you an ador-" She cut herself off, after seeing the babies hair. she thought to herself "It couldn't be.. could it?"

She carefully picked up the basket and put it on the dinner table. She then noticed a note.

"Dear Human,

This is a note from the Spirit of Youth. You're daughter, Azula, was mixing with good and bad energy. It centered itself around you. At the request of the Mother of Faces, I did a rare thing. I gave your daughter another chance at youth. Her memories and thoughts are in tact, but soon enough she shall adopt the new role. Treat this baby with care.

Sincerely,
The Spirit of Youth"
15411211.title: Baby Azula sent to Mommy

154112111.content:
After reading the letter, Ursa was tearing up. The spirits had given her a second chance to raise Azula. She wouldn't make the same mistake this time; she planned to give Azula tons of love.

Kiyi brought Ursa out of her trance, by saying "M-mommy, is everything alright?"

Ursa knew exactly what to say "Yes I'm alright sweetie. Come here"

Ursa motioned for a hug and warmly said "You have a new little sister is all"

Kiyi lit up with delight "Really?!, we're really going to keep her?!"

Ursa gave a chuckle "Yes. Though, there is something special about this baby."

Kiyi turned her head with curiosity "Huh, what is it?"

"Well.. you know you're two half-siblings."

Kiyi was happy again, "Yes. Zuko was so kind" then she looked upset "Though, Azula was mean. I don't ever want to see her again."

Tears formed in Ursa's eyes, she truly loved Azula and Kiyi's statement made her feel guilty again. Kiyi looked upset "I, I'm sorry mommy. I didn't mean that."

Ursa brushed off her tears "Its alright. What I was going to say is... this baby is Azula. It says the Youth spirit did it to give her another chance."

Kiyi was confused "So, will she be mean?"

"Maybe for a little while, but thats where we all come in. Give her tons of love and she'll be nice."

Kiyi gave a light smile "Of course mommy. Azula and I will be bestest sisters!!"

Kiyi spoke up a little to much at this point and woke up Azula. Azula started crying loudly "WaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaaHH!!"

Kiyi looked concerned, but Ursa reassured her that everything was fine. Ursa then took out Azula from the basket and told Kiyi to signal the others.
154112111.title: Accepting Azula's new life

choices: Ursa and Katara take care of the baby, others are an audience
1541121111.content:
Luckily, Zuko and the gang just recently left. She could see Oppa in the distance and yelled at the top of her lungs "COME BACK! AZULA!!"

Zuko heard faintly "Zula!!"

He asked quickly "Can we stop?"

Sokka and Katara looked confused. Aang stopped Oppa and responded though "Why? What's the matter?"

"I-I just heard the name, 'Zula', faintly and look" He pointed back to Ursa's house. "Outside is there daughter Kiyi. Azula could be harming them right now. She might have waited for us to leave."

After Zuko said 'Azula could be harming them right now' Aang immediately had Oppa go back. He didn't say anything, he just had a concerned look.

Katara motioned to both Zuko and Aang. "I'm sure everythings alright, lets not panic."

Meanwhile, Sokka said goofably "Man.. that sister of yours, Zuko, is crazy!"

Kiyi eventually saw them come back and cheered.

Within about five minutes, the gang was back. Zuko quickly asked "Where's Azula?

Kiyi answered happily "She's inside, but every things all better."

They all looked confused, except for Zuko. He assumed this meant she came back and apologized. He rushed towards the house, while the rest were slower to come in.

Once inside, he saw his mother cradling a sleeping baby. He hesitantly asked "Where- where is she?"

Ursa only smiled, "Come sit with me. Everything is fine."

Her words were reassuring, but Zuko was still on edge.

Ursa only pointed to the letter on the table and said "Read that letter."

Zuko read it, but he couldn't believe it. While he was reading the others came in.

Sokka asked what was going on, and Katara shhed him. "Be quiet, something doesn't seem right." Kiyi and the gang just sat at the table, waiting for Zuko to finish.

He cautiously asked "So.. this baby is...?"

Ursa answered "Yes, this baby is Azula."

After that the room erupted with people talking over each other. It was so loud that Azula woke up again "WaaaaaaaaaaaaaaHHH!!"

Everyone stopped talking afterwards, except Ursa. She was calming her new baby. "There there Azula, mommy is here."

Azula couldn't speak, but her face expressions showed she wasn't a normal baby. After seeing her mother, Azula looked happy, then it quickly turned to anger. She started yelling incoherently in baby talk.

Katara happened to be sitting on Ursa's right side and warmly said "Awwwwwwwww..."

Azula was mortified; she covered her eyes from sight. Meanwhile, Ursa kissed her forehead, causing Azula to tear up. Azula didn't know what to do, embrace her mommy or resist. Soon all she could do was embrace Ursa, after Ursa hugged her.

She brought her chubby arms around Ursa and wailed. Azula was broken, the pressure of the situation made her crack. All anger and fury turned to sorrow. Her fire turned to sorrow.

1551.title: Mai

choices: She starts playing with little Mai
1551111.content:
Mai and Ty Lee were on their way to vacation; both had just finished their last days of royal fire nation schooling. Azula would've come if she didn't have an amazing opportunity to visit her an earth bender prison. She was eager to see how the fire nation crushed so many spirits. While on the boat ride both girls, Mai and Ty Lee, were acting their normal selves. Ty Lee was practicing acrobatics with a huge smile on her face, while Mai sat quite in the shade looking bored.

Ty Lee saw her friend and stopped for a second, looking dumb founded "Mai, is everything alright?"

Mai gave a huge sigh as usual "Yeah.. just annoyed at long this taking, the usual of course."

Ty Lee gave a huge smile "Awww, don't worry we'll be there eventually."

Mai responded apathetically "Yep.."

Ty Lee ignored the tone of voice, thinking to herself 'eh why can't she lighten up?'

The boat eventually arrived at the island and the two girls walked to their two week vacation home.

It was an average house, but there was a huge catch; there was only one teenager room, the other was a baby room.

Mai was obviously annoyed "Augh, this is so stupid. We're two teenage girls, why'd they think to give us this house?"

Ty Lee twiddled her thumbs nervously "There's a funny thing about that. I just said two girls would be staying. They asked what rooms and I said '1 normal and another small." Ty giggled anxiously, "They might have thought normal for me and the other one small for.. well... a baby."

Mai facepalmed "You're so great with detail."

Ty heard the sarcasm and took somewhat offense "I'm sorry that I'm not perfect with detail like you."

"It would help if you paid attention instead of demanding it."

Ty raised her voice "Could you be a little NICER?! Did your mother not teach you anything when you were little."

Mai's tone became harsher "Yes, but because my mother was so controlling why bother. I thought you'd be less annoying on this trip."

"You should be nicer then, and I shouldn't have to tell you this either. Just grow up!"

Mai gave a snarky comment "Yes, mom." and closed the door to the teenager room.

Ty Lee was so angry with Mai, but she decided to leave as well to cool off. "Fine.. I'll be back later."

Mai didn't respond, which only upset Ty Lee more. She was talking to herself going through the woods. "Why can't she just be polite for once. I smear her mother raised her wrong. If only I had a chance to re-do her awful personality. But.. no I can't because I'm me.. Ty Lee who always messes up at everything.

I kind old lady heard what she was saying, and came around the side "Hi, I'm Lindi and I couldn't help overhearing your complaints."

Ty Lee was very kind to the old lady and blushed at the remark. "Oh, I'm sorry if I bothered you. Just talking about my mean old friend."

"I might be able to help actually.."

Ty Lee perked up with head tilted to the side "Hmm.. What is it?"

Lindi nonchalantly said "Well, you were talking about how poorly she was raised right?"

"Yeah.."

"then give her this drink and you'll have a chance. Sorta.."

"What does it do?"

Lindi smiled smugly "Ha, you want the specifics. Just give her this drink and she'll turn into a baby for ya. You'll be able to baby her and after a week or two she'll obey."

Ty Lee's eye lit up. "She-she'll turn into a baby... That's ADORABLE! Please give me that drink I promise to love her and cuddle her."

Before Ty could notice, Lindi was no where in sight. However, the drink was in her hands; it was a clear drink, very identical to water. Ty Lee smiled "Mommy is coming home Little Mai."

She calmly walked back inside and poured to glasses, one with the age drink and the other with just water. She started to take a sip of the water, when Mai came in. Ty Lee quickly dropped her glass to respond "Hi Mai, I'm sorry I did what I did. I cooled off and made you a cup of water. We'll just share that one room."

Mai gave a slight smile "Its Ok Ty Lee, lets just move on."

Ty Lee then handed her the glass "Wanna drink?"

Mai was confused "ah.. sure. She sat down to the table and started slowly drinking. Ty watched out of the corner of her eye.

Mai surprisingly drank it down quickly. "Now that the drama is out of the way, why don't we go to the beach?"

Ty Lee quickly responded "But, I haven't put my stuff away yet. One sec."

Mai waited in the kitchen, while Ty Lee rearranged the room to her liking and moved out Mai's stuff. Mai saw Ty coming out with her stuff and walked up. "What are you doing?"

"You won't need this stuff anymore. You're sleeping in the baby room silly."

After Ty Lee said 'baby' Mai started to notice her body change in form. Her clothes became heavier and heavier and the regressing picked up speed. First 1 year then 2 then 4 then 7, By 8 years old, Mai got on her knees. Then the 7 years left her being and she fell on her tummy. "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHHH"

Ty Lee took Mai out of the huge clothes, leaving a cute naked baby at arms length.

"Awwwwwwwwww, Mommy Ty Lee will make sure her baby feels wonderful." Her voice took Mai off guard and she stared at Ty in confusion. In response, Ty Lee cradled her new daughter "Don't cry, you just need a diaper and you'll feel great."

She took Mai into the baby room and rested her on the table softly. She took out some baby powder and lathered Mai's bottom. "Here comes the diapy wiapy." She held up Mai's chubby legs to slide a clean white fluffy diaper underneath. She lowered Mai down, and pinned the diaper in place. Time went by. "How do you feel sweety?"

Mai blushed, but was finally ready to speak. "Ty Wee.. Why you mwake me babwy?"
1551111.title: Ty Wee Qwit Actwing Wike I'm a Babwy

choices: Little Mai needs her Din Din (dinner)
15511111.content:
Ty Lee picked up Mai and started playfully bouncing her. "To re-raise you of course."

"Wha.. What?!"

Ty gave a smug look "Its alright wittle Mai. You were misbehaving being a cwanky girl early. After calling me 'mom' I figured why not be your mom for the trip."

"I didwent mwean it wike that. Why cwan't I have a norwal week?" Mai started to silently tear up. It was a becoming obvious that Mai's emotions were more prevalent. She wasn't hiding them like normal.

"D'awwww, Aren't you adorable! I've always wanted you to emote and your aura is more vibrant."

Mai was starting to get more emotional "I-I can't hewlp it. I wike my pwivacwy, AHHH I want my PWIVACWY! WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHHH!!"

Ty Lee looked around to find something to stop her. "AhA! here we are. This is what the baby needs." She plucked a pacifier into Mai's mouth. Mai was surprised by the action especially the pacifier taste; it was.. good. Mai's befuddled look soon changed to smiles.

Ty Lee then checked the drawers for baby clothing and found the cutest little fire nation attire. Ty put a dazzling red baby dress on Mai, though Mai's diaper was still easily visible. In addition, she put little baby shoes on Mai.

"Now, you want some sleepy weepy time or play time? Shake your head for play time!"

Mai shook her head. She wanted more time to experience the other toys.

Mai gently laid her on the soft carpet, which felt great. The comfy diaper pushed up on Mai and she couldn't help bouncing up and down. Mai was still angry at Ty Lee for the baby change, but her fun was slowly opening her up to it. This might be something she wants to stay as.

Whenwhile Ty Lee was getting a box full of toys. When she came back she practically died of cuteness. "Awwwwwww, is the baby enjoying her diaper? Yes she is. Yes she is."

Then Ty Lee lifted Mai up high in her arms, "You're an air balloon! An adorable air balloon at that!" Mai felt like she was gonna fall though and tears starting forming. She unfortunately couldn't remove the pacifier in her mouth, but Ty Lee got the memo. "Awwww, I'm sorry. I didn't mean to scare you. Come to mommy"

Soon Mai was being covered in Ty's arms, feeling as warm and toasty as could be. She felt safe and happy for a change. She always understood safety to never come with happiness. Typically safety meant guards and strict rules. Here though safety was cuddling with mommy or Ty Lee, and sucking a pacifier.

Mai let out a coo, and then felt even more warmth in her diaper. At first she loved it, but then the warmth went away and her diaper just felt wet; she had peed herself. The discomfort was so much that she lost grip on the pacifier to cry "WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAAHH"

Ty Lee was playful with it. "Ew, the baby made a wetty. Oh well, nothing mommy can't fix. Come her darling." She held Mai tightly and stood up straight, making sure not to drop her. Then she walked carefully to the changing table and placed Mai on it. She tickled Mai's tummy making her laugh a little. "Awww, thats it. Don't you worry." She then undid the pin, and lowered the straps. Held up Mai's legs to slide the diaper out. To comfort Mai, she wiped her bottom with a warm towel and applied more baby powder. Holding her legs steady, Ty placed another diaper underneath and pined it in place.

"There, so how does my wittle Mai feel about mommy Ty Lee?"

Mai crossed her arms at the question. "I stiw down't wike her. Me big gwirl, not babwy."

"But sweetie, don't you love your new baby toys?"

Mai blushed "Tha-tha pwoves nothwing. I stiw shwold have sway i dis."

"Oh, so you want to be turned back?"

Mai became very nervous at the question "No.. I-I wike, no wuv this feewing. Da-down't twake it away fwom me... pwease."

"D'awwwww,, thats a good girl. I knew you'd love this like me. This just proves I am your true mommy."

Mai didn't really have a response and just stood there frustrated.

"Well, no more sulking." Ty put her on the carpet floor again and showed her a baby rattle. "See this, its a rat-tle. Can you say that honey?"

Mai humored her, it was the least she could do for feeling this happy. "Wa-wle"

"Awwwww, you have trouble pronouncing your Rs. But, you've been a good girl. Here's your rattle."

Mai started to play with the rattle and she loved the thing to bits. about 20 minutes went by until she was done with it.

Ty Lee remarked. "If only your former brother was here, you and him could play together."
15511111.title: She starts playing with little Mai

1552.content: So you chose everyone's favorite acrobatic circus performer from the Fire Nation, Hmm? You know, why not. After all, I don't see why we shouldn't allow Ty Lee her chance in the spotlight, but the question is this; what sort of transformation should we use on Ty Lee?

15521.content: Okay, now this TF category will focus on the transformation into a mythological creature, like a dragon, minotaur, etc. Now then, let's get started, shall we?
15521.title: Mythical Creature TF

155211.content:
Gargoyles, huh? Talk about thinking outside of the box. And for those who don't know what a Gargoyle actually is, then allow me to explain.

The classic Gargoyle is a living monster made out of stone, but these...unique creatures come in many varieties: some have a full body, often with a pair of bat-like or possibly bird-like wings; other times they are simply disembodied visages that simply watch, since they sometimes have only half a body. But like humans, these creatures can either be make or female.

Unlike other stone creatures like the Golem, Gargoyles are always in the form of a inhuman, possibly demonic, creature, standing guard over gothic-style structures, such as Cathedrals and European castles. According to legend, it has been said that Gargoyles only come alive to fend off evil, which can explain why these creatures are commonly found in churches. Also, there is a possibility that Gargoyles just look evil and scary to intimidate bad intruders. The name "Gargoyle" comes from the Gargouille, a dragon that spouted water from it's mouth, causing floods.

You thought I wasn't going to put in the Gargoyles from the Disney Gargoyles TV show, didn't you? Well you're wrong, fellow readers, because I'm putting them in here as well.

The Disney Gargoyle is somewhat different from the classic Gargoyle, whether it's the way they fly or their anatomy. Disney Gargoyles, unlike the classic Gargoyle, aren't made out of stone, but actual flesh and bone. The reason why is because the Disney Gargoyle actually turns to stone during the day, putting them in a 'stone sleep', but also from any wounds they might have received.

However, when the sun goes down, these Gargoyles wake up and crack through their stone shells. As for their appearances, a Disney Gargoyles' appearance varies from clan to clan, from their physical body structure to the color of their skin, not to mention they sometimes have hair and or facial hair like humans, only it takes much longer to grow.

Unlike the classic Gargoyle, the Disney Gargoyles are known to be bipedal, although they can sprint on all fours if they need to, and are more or less humanoid in shape. However, like the classic Gargoyle, the Disney Gargoyle have a pair of wings, only they vary with each Gargoyle. For example, their wings are usually leathery, most commonly bat-like with the digits separating the wing membrane into multiple segments, but sometimes they have these pterodactyl-like wings with one continuous membrane and the digits forming a small hand atop the wing, but there are a few Gargoyles that have these wings that are Web-like in the same manner as a flying squirrel.

Also, Disney Gargoyles are known to have three clawed fingers and a fully opposable clawed thumb on each hand, while their legs are digitgrade, with hip, knee, and ankle joints fully flexible like that of a cat, as they walk upright on their toes. However, the Gargoyles refer to their feet and hands as "talons" and accurately so, considering the strength they possess.

Even though they have wings, the Disney Gargoyles can only glide, but that is enhanced when the wind currents are strong, allowing them to glide at a longer distance.

Ok, now it's time for the decision making. Will you choose the Classic Gargoyle, or the Disney Gargoyle?
155211.title: Gargoyle TF

1552112.content:
Going with the Disney Gargoyle, Hmm? Well, this could get interesting. But as for what Ty Lee would look like as a Gargoyle, thankfully for us, there's a drawing of Ty Lee as a Gargoyle on the website DeviantArt, as part of DA user YoukaiYume's series of drawings from his Avatar/Gargoyle crossover he named "Avatar-Goyles", which shows us what happens if Aang and the other characters were Gargoyles.

Now then, should Ty Lee's transformation into a Gargoyle be an instant transformation, as if she just woke up as a Gargoyle? Or should her transformation be gradual, building up until she is a real living Gargoyle?

1553112121.content: Korra approached the fountain, the rather athletically built Avatar and her friend Asami walked towards the fountain.
